summary: Adds The Frozen Throne from the Warcraft universe.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds The Frozen Throne from the Warcraft universe.
Requires DAWNGUARD.

v2.0
Added the Lich King to fight. Has 3000 health.
Minor detail improvements.
Snow Storm is now continuous. May tone it back a bit next update.
Attainable Lich King Armor and Weapon.
Removed Ner'Zhul entirely. (staff still available through console commands though)

v1.1
-Location has been changed to be more on the sea.
-Ner'Zhul's fighting style has been upgraded.
-A new weapon has been added; Ner'Zhul's Staff
-The pillar has been redone a bit more
-On the map the icon for Frozen Throne Base has been changed to the landmark icon (looks like an upside down triangle).
-The new weapon (Ner'Zhul's Staff) is only attainable by beating Ner'Zhul.

v1
-Pillar completely redone, now bigger and taller.
-Added spiralling pathway
-Removal of Doors from vAlpha
-Ner'Zhul redone, now looks more like he does in Warcraft lore.
-Added Map Markers for the base of The Frozen Throne, and the peak (Labeled simply "The Frozen Throne")

vAlpha
-Give you The Frozen Throne to discover
-Gives you Ner'Zhul to fight
-Gives a nice Throne to sit on

Beware: Lich King has about 3000 health.

Future Updates:
None, i have moved on from this mod into other areas, and have since stopped making mods. I may return to it in the future however this one is considered finished.Â 

WHEN UPDATING:
ENSURE THAT YOUR CHARACTER ISN'T NEAR THE LOCATION OF THE MOD, THIS ENSURES WHEN YOU GO THERE FOR THE FIRST TIME EVERYTHING IS LOADED NEW AND PROPER.

I highly suggest you look up Bigger and Badder LICH KING Collectors Edition by LuciferX10, it gives you The Lich King's armor, and his weapon, with a couple of cool extra things they're working on.

Suggestions Greatly Accepted!

This mod was inspired by Shruikan1994's mod of the same name. Though i felt it lacked a few things, so this is my version.
author: Shadowling1661
